auth.name: Name
auth.signInDescription: Sign in to your CVeetje account to manage your CVs
auth.signUpDescription: Sign up to start creating professional CVs with AI
auth.termsAgreement: By signing up, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. You get 5 free credits per month.

validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters
validation.nameMin: Name must be at least 2 characters

landing.heroDescription: No more hours of tweaking CVs. Save your profile once, paste a job posting, and receive a CV that's automatically optimized for that specific position.
landing.freeNote: 5 free downloads per month. No credit card required.

valueProps.enterOnceDesc: Save your profile and reuse it for every application
valueProps.autoFitDesc: AI analyzes the job posting and optimizes your CV
valueProps.readyInMinutesDesc: From job posting to application-ready CV in a few clicks

howItWorks.title: It's That Simple
howItWorks.subtitle: From LinkedIn to a perfectly tailored CV in 3 steps
howItWorks.step1Desc: Paste your LinkedIn, upload screenshots of an old CV, or enter manually. You only need to do this once.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Copy-paste the job description. AI analyzes the requirements and automatically tailors your CV.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Download your CV as PDF. Optionally add an AI-generated cover letter.

preview.title: Professional Result,
preview.description: You'll receive a fully formatted CV with your details, optimized for the job you're applying for. Including professional styling, clear sections, and ATS-friendly formatting.
preview.keywordsProcessed: Keywords from job posting automatically included
preview.experiencePrioritized: Experience and skills prioritized by relevance
preview.industryStyle: Style matching your industry and role
preview.readyDownload: Ready to download as PDF immediately

profiles.title: Enter Once,
profiles.description: Create multiple profiles for different roles. Upload your LinkedIn, screenshots of an old CV, or enter manually. Never start from scratch again.
profiles.uploadOptions: Upload LinkedIn text or CV screenshots

jobAnalysis.title: AI Analyzes
jobAnalysis.description: Paste the job description and AI automatically extracts job requirements, keywords, and even provides a salary estimate based on market data.
jobAnalysis.marketInsights: Market insights per industry and location

styleGenerator.title: Unique Style
styleGenerator.description: Choose your creativity level and let AI generate a professional style that matches your industry and the job posting. Not satisfied? Regenerate unlimited until you find the perfect look.
styleGenerator.unlimitedRegenerate: Unlimited regeneration at no extra cost

linkedInExport.title: Your Work Collected,
linkedInExport.description: All your experiences are already in your profile. With one click, generate LinkedIn-optimized content: a compelling headline, a strong about section, and CAR-method job descriptions.
linkedInExport.headline: Keyword-rich headline that stands out
linkedInExport.about: About section with strong hook and structure

features.title: Why CVeetje?
features.subtitle: Everything to apply faster and better

autoFit.title: Automatically Tailored to Jobs
autoFit.description: AI reads the job posting and optimizes your CV
autoFit.skills: Matching skills appear at the top

motivationLetter.title: Cover Letter Included
motivationLetter.description: Based on your CV and the job posting

preview.title: Preview & Adjust
preview.wysiwyg: What you see is what you get

styling.title: Professional Formatting
styling.aiColors: AI chooses colors for your field

apiKey.title: Your Data, Your Key
apiKey.description: Use your own AI API key
apiKey.payForUse: Only pay for AI costs you incur

pricing.title: Simple Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Only pay for downloads. No subscriptions.
pricing.paymentMethods: Secure payment via Mollie (iDEAL, Credit card and more)

cta.title: Done with Fiddling?
cta.description: Save your profile, paste a job posting, and download your perfectly tailored CV. It's that simple.

dashboard.subtitle: Create AI-powered CVs tailored to your dream job

setupRequired.title: Setup Required
setupRequired.description: To generate CVs, you need to configure your AI API key. CVeetje uses your own API key from OpenAI, Anthropic, or Google to generate CVs.

credits.title: Credits
credits.subtitle: Manage your credits and purchase more to download CVs
credits.paymentSuccess: Payment successful! Your credits have been added to your account.

buy.title: Buy Credits
buy.description: Purchase credits to download more CVs. Pay securely with iDEAL, credit card, or other payment methods via Mollie.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your account and API configuration

currentConfig.title: Current Configuration
currentConfig.description: Your API key is configured and ready to use

configureApiKey.title: Configure API Key
configureApiKey.description: Your API key is stored securely and encrypted. CVeetje uses your own API key to generate CVs, so you only pay for what you use.

messages.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove your API key?

profiles.title: Profiles
profiles.subtitle: Manage your saved profiles for quick CV creation
profiles.noProfilesDescription: You haven't saved any profiles yet. Create a CV and save your profile to reuse it later.

deleteConfirm.title: Delete Profile
deleteConfirm.description: Are you sure you want to delete this profile? This action cannot be undone.

languageSelection.title: CV Language
languageSelection.description: In which language should the CV content be generated?

noApiKey.title: API Key Required
noApiKey.description: You need to configure an AI API key before you can generate CVs.

generating.title: Your CV is being generated...
generating.analyzing: Analyzing your profile and job posting...

errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized for this action
errors.invalidToken: Invalid session, please sign in again
errors.loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.

home.title: CVeetje - CV Automatically Tailored to Every Job | Stop the Fiddling
home.description: Stop spending hours tweaking CVs. CVeetje analyzes job postings and automatically tailors your CV. Save your profile and generate a perfectly tailored CV with one click. Start free.

login.title: Sign In
login.description: Sign in to your CVeetje account to manage your professional CVs and create new ones with AI.

register.title: Create Free Account
register.description: Create a free CVeetje account and receive 5 credits per month. Start creating professional CVs with AI right away.
